snippet: Representative Timothy Johnson, a Republican, is trying to back out of a simplistic pledge to never, ever increase taxes, no matter what the cost for struggling Americans.
abstract: Editorial observes that Illinois Rep Timothy Johnson, who has been redistricted into a more Democratic region, has tried to deny that he signed Grover Norquist's antitax pledge; asserts that voters should be asking their representatives whether their oath of office matters more than their pledge to Grover Norquist.
lead_paragraph: Representative Timothy Johnson, a Republican, is trying to back out of a simplistic pledge to never, ever increase taxes, no matter what the cost for struggling Americans.
